name: PicnicMatch
description:
Classic match3 game with a cute picnic items theme made from scratch in unity using c#

*My first game as a B.C.s student is here! 

this game was made as a personal project  to learn and evolve skills as an aspiring game developer and  contain the basic gameplay mechanics and 3 distinct  levels to explore.

Hopefully more games will be added in the future :)

Features:

-4 types of bombs can be created from making a match with more the 3

-2 game modes limited time / limited turns

-Stars and high scores system for each level based on your in game performance

-saved and loads your progress automatically
